aboutSeedText: Your secret backup phrase makes it easy to back up and restore your account.
warningSeedText: WARNING: Never disclose your backup phrase. Anyone with this phrase can take your Ether forever.
revealSeedText: Click here to reveal secret words
tipSeedText:
Tips: 
Store this phrase in a password manager like 1Password. Write this phrase on a piece of paper and store in a secure location. If you want even more security, write it down on multiple pieces of paper and store each in 2 - 3 different locations. 
Memorize this phrase
downloadSeedText: Download this Secret Backup Phrase and keep it stored safely on an external encrypted hard drive or storage medium.
alertSeedText: Please click on the Secret Phrase to reveal it before proceeding.
confirmSeedText: Please select each phrase in order to make sure it is correct.
importTitle: Import an account with seed phrase
agreeTermText: I have read and agree to the
alertTermText: Please agree to our Term of Use to proceed.
homeSubtitle: What would you like to work with?
sendSuccessTitle: Your transaction is on the way!
passwordErrorText: Password length must be 8 characters or longer
repasswordErrorText: Re-enter password must be the same
